text: This seems like a great alternative for quick websites that don’t need a full blown CMS. Maybe if we have any such projects in the future we could test it. <http://getgrav.org/>

attachments.text: Grav is an easy to use, yet powerful, opensource CMS that requires no database
attachments.fallback: Grav is an easy to use, yet powerful, opensource CMS that requires no database

text:
Big Bird - made me cry last night. Check it out!! Its streaming for free on amazon prime.

<http://www.iambigbird.com/>

attachments.title: NEW HOME PAGE
attachments.text: I AM BIG BIRD is a feature-length documentary about Caroll Spinney, who has been Sesame Street’s Big Bird and Oscar the Grouch since 1969… and at 78 years old, he has no intention of stopping.
attachments.fallback: I AM BIG BIRD: NEW HOME PAGE
